name: Heyting.IsRegular.eq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HasCompl α
a : α
a✝ : Heyting.IsRegular a
⊢ Eq (HasCompl.compl (HasCompl.compl a)) a
decl:
protected theorem IsRegular.eq : IsRegular a → aᶜᶜ = a :=
  id

name: Heyting.isRegular_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular Bot.bot
decl: theorem isRegular_bot : IsRegular (⊥ : α) := by rw [IsRegular, compl_bot, compl_top]

name: Heyting.isRegular_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular Top.top
decl: theorem isRegular_top : IsRegular (⊤ : α) := by rw [IsRegular, compl_top, compl_bot]

name: Heyting.IsRegular.inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : α
ha : Heyting.IsRegular a
hb : Heyting.IsRegular b
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular (Min.min a b)
decl:
theorem IsRegular.inf (ha : IsRegular a) (hb : IsRegular b) : IsRegular (a ⊓ b) := by
  rw [IsRegular, compl_compl_inf_distrib, ha.eq, hb.eq]

name: Heyting.IsRegular.himp
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : α
ha : Heyting.IsRegular a
hb : Heyting.IsRegular b
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular (HImp.himp a b)
decl:
theorem IsRegular.himp (ha : IsRegular a) (hb : IsRegular b) : IsRegular (a ⇨ b) := by
  rw [IsRegular, compl_compl_himp_distrib, ha.eq, hb.eq]

name: Heyting.isRegular_compl
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a : α
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular (HasCompl.compl a)
decl:
theorem isRegular_compl (a : α) : IsRegular aᶜ :=
  compl_compl_compl _

name: Heyting.IsRegular.disjoint_compl_left_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : α
ha : Heyting.IsRegular a
⊢ Iff (Disjoint (HasCompl.compl a) b) (LE.le b a)
decl:
protected theorem IsRegular.disjoint_compl_left_iff (ha : IsRegular a) :
    Disjoint aᶜ b ↔ b ≤ a := by rw [← le_compl_iff_disjoint_left, ha.eq]

name: Heyting.IsRegular.disjoint_compl_right_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : α
hb : Heyting.IsRegular b
⊢ Iff (Disjoint a (HasCompl.compl b)) (LE.le a b)
decl:
protected theorem IsRegular.disjoint_compl_right_iff (hb : IsRegular b) :
    Disjoint a bᶜ ↔ a ≤ b := by rw [← le_compl_iff_disjoint_right, hb.eq]

-- See note [reducible non-instances]

name: Heyting.Regular.prop
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular ↑a
decl: theorem prop : ∀ a : Regular α, IsRegular a.val := Subtype.prop

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_injective
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
⊢ Function.Injective Heyting.Regular.val
decl:
theorem coe_injective : Injective ((↑) : Regular α → α) :=
  Subtype.coe_injective

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_inj
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Iff (Eq ↑a ↑b) (Eq a b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_inj {a b : Regular α} : (a : α) = b ↔ a = b :=
  Subtype.coe_inj

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
⊢ Eq (↑Top.top) Top.top
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_top : ((⊤ : Regular α) : α) = ⊤ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
⊢ Eq (↑Bot.bot) Bot.bot
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_bot : ((⊥ : Regular α) : α) = ⊥ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (↑(Min.min a b)) (Min.min ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_inf (a b : Regular α) : (↑(a ⊓ b) : α) = (a : α) ⊓ b :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_himp
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (↑(HImp.himp a b)) (HImp.himp ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_himp (a b : Regular α) : (↑(a ⇨ b) : α) = (a : α) ⇨ b :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_compl
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (↑(HasCompl.compl a)) (HasCompl.compl ↑a)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_compl (a : Regular α) : (↑aᶜ : α) = (a : α)ᶜ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_le_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Iff (LE.le ↑a ↑b) (LE.le a b)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_le_coe {a b : Regular α} : (a : α) ≤ b ↔ a ≤ b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_lt_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Iff (LT.lt ↑a ↑b) (LT.lt a b)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_lt_coe {a b : Regular α} : (a : α) < b ↔ a < b :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_toRegular
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a : α
⊢ Eq (↑(Heyting.Regular.toRegular a)) (HasCompl.compl (HasCompl.compl a))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_toRegular (a : α) : (toRegular a : α) = aᶜᶜ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.toRegular_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (Heyting.Regular.toRegular ↑a) a
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toRegular_coe (a : Regular α) : toRegular (a : α) = a :=
  coe_injective a.2

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (↑(Max.max a b)) (HasCompl.compl (HasCompl.compl (Max.max ↑a ↑b)))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_sup (a b : Regular α) : (↑(a ⊔ b) : α) = ((a : α) ⊔ b)ᶜᶜ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.Regular.coe_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : HeytingAlgebra α
a b : Heyting.Regular α
⊢ Eq (↑(SDiff.sdiff a b)) (Min.min (↑a) (HasCompl.compl ↑b))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_sdiff (a b : Regular α) : (↑(a \ b) : α) = (a : α) ⊓ bᶜ :=
  rfl

name: Heyting.isRegular_of_boolean
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanAlgebra α
a : α
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular a
decl:
theorem isRegular_of_boolean : ∀ a : α, IsRegular a :=
  compl_compl

name: Heyting.isRegular_of_decidable
initialProofState:
p : Prop
inst✝ : Decidable p
⊢ Heyting.IsRegular p
decl:
/-- A decidable proposition is intuitionistically Heyting-regular. -/
-- Porting note: removed @[nolint decidable_classical]
theorem isRegular_of_decidable (p : Prop) [Decidable p] : IsRegular p :=
  propext <| Decidable.not_not
